name: Aldred Knight
description:
Aldred - Knight of Honor is a 2D action adventure game. In it you will meet Aldrid, the most powerful swordsman of the divine flame. With him you will pass through innumerable obstacles and war bosses to rid the kingdom of a great evil force.

Featuring:

★A friendly classic art style
★More than 20 different and challenging stages
★Several bosses to defeat
★Diferent weapons and spells
★Three maps to explore
★Hidden objects and fragments of story
★Special objects to destroy and collect
★Characters to rescue
